content: this is a written amigurumi pattern for makar the korok from the wind waker the finished toy measures approximately 18 cm tall for this pattern you will need a 4mm crochet hook 1 ball of beige yarn 50g and another ball of dark green yarn 50g plus black felt for the face i also suggest including a small gacha ball like the ones in kinder eggs to put inside the body with a couple of bells so makar sounds just like in game i hope you enjoy this pattern and happy crocheting
